      • serializeToNetwork

        public void serializeToNetwork(PacketBuffer p_192140_1_)

      • criterionFromJson

        public static Criterion criterionFromJson(com.google.gson.JsonObject json,
                                          com.google.gson.JsonDeserializationContext context)
        Deserialize a single Criterion from json. The ICriterionTrigger is chosen by the "trigger" property of the object, which can then handle the optional "conditions" in the object. The "conditions", if present, must be a JsonObject. The resulting ICriterionInstance is wrapped in a Criterion.
        戻り値:
        the deserialized Criterion.
        関連項目:
        ICriterionTrigger.deserializeInstance(JsonObject, JsonDeserializationContext)

      • criterionFromNetwork

        public static Criterion criterionFromNetwork(PacketBuffer p_192146_0_)

      • criteriaFromJson

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Criterion> criteriaFromJson(com.google.gson.JsonObject json,
                                                                         com.google.gson.JsonDeserializationContext context)
        Read criteria from json. The keys of the object name the criteria, and the values (which must be objects) are the criteria themselves.
        戻り値:
        the deserialized criteria. Each key-value pair consists of a Criterion and its name.
        関連項目:
        criterionFromJson(JsonObject, JsonDeserializationContext)

      • criteriaFromNetwork

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Criterion> criteriaFromNetwork(PacketBuffer bus)
        Read criteria from buf.
        戻り値:
        the read criteria. Each key-value pair consists of a Criterion and its name.
        関連項目:
        serializeToNetwork(Map, PacketBuffer)

      • serializeToNetwork

        public static void serializeToNetwork(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Criterion> criteria,
                                      PacketBuffer buf)
        Write criteria to buf.
        関連項目:
        criteriaFromNetwork(PacketBuffer)
